svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 5, 2023" date: "2023-08-05"
* Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko . Notes from
Tim Beiko and Christine Kim : EIP4788 (beacon block root in EVM): agreed to use a
contract rather than a precompile, will need audit/formal verification, devnet 8 will
wait for implementations EF devops launched 2.1M validator testnet in prep for Holešky
testnet EIP5806 (delegate transaction) & EIP7377 (migration transaction) presented and
broader discussions on account abstraction Verkle Trie update : performance
improvements, migration via overlay method and remaining questions
Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko . Notes from
* EIP4788 (beacon block root in EVM): agreed to use a contract rather than a
precompile, will need audit/formal verification, devnet 8 will wait for implementations
EIP4788 (beacon block root in EVM): agreed to use a contract rather than a precompile,
will need audit/formal verification, devnet 8 will wait for implementations
* EF devops launched 2.1M validator testnet in prep for Holešky testnet
EF devops launched 2.1M validator testnet in prep for Holešky testnet
* EIP5806 (delegate transaction) & EIP7377 (migration transaction) presented and
EIP5806 (delegate transaction) & EIP7377 (migration transaction) presented and broader
* Verkle Trie update : performance improvements, migration via overlay method and
Verkle Trie update : performance improvements, migration via overlay method and
* Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.1 : data gas renamed blob gas & additional tests
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.1 : data gas renamed blob gas & additional tests
* EIP4844: Terence: EIP4844 economics KZG Ceremony has 133k contributions, lobby is
empty ; list of special contributions (from satellites to cats) GossipSub optimizations
(IDontWant & Limit flood publishing) should reduce Nimbus CL client bandwidth
* KZG Ceremony has 133k contributions, lobby is empty ; list of special contributions
KZG Ceremony has 133k contributions, lobby is empty ; list of special contributions
* GossipSub optimizations (IDontWant & Limit flood publishing) should reduce Nimbus CL
GossipSub optimizations (IDontWant & Limit flood publishing) should reduce Nimbus CL
* Epoch long reorg on Goerli testnet , unlikely to happen on mainnet Ben Edgington’s
Epoch long reorg on Goerli testnet , unlikely to happen on mainnet
* Ben Edgington’s explainer from Upgrading Ethereum book
* SSZ++ : fast SSZ library, 27ms deserialization & 23ms hashing on full beacon state
SSZ++ : fast SSZ library, 27ms deserialization & 23ms hashing on full beacon state
* Prototype EVMMAX API in evmone: allows implementing most precompiles
Prototype EVMMAX API in evmone: allows implementing most precompiles
* Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.10.0 : performance improvements, NodeJS v20, IPv6
support, bandwidth optimizations and builderOnly option for DVT users Teku v23.8.0 :
state caching improvements & minimum Java version updated to Java 17
* Lodestar v1.10.0 : performance improvements, NodeJS v20, IPv6 support, bandwidth
optimizations and builderOnly option for DVT users
Lodestar v1.10.0 : performance improvements, NodeJS v20, IPv6 support, bandwidth
* Teku v23.8.0 : state caching improvements & minimum Java version updated to Java 17
Teku v23.8.0 : state caching improvements & minimum Java version updated to Java 17
* Vitalik: nuances of data recoverability in data availability sampling
Vitalik: nuances of data recoverability in data availability sampling
* Offchain Labs BOLD (Bounded Liquidity Delay): proposed dispute protocol for
permissionless validation of Arbitrum chains, eliminates delay attack vector
Offchain Labs BOLD (Bounded Liquidity Delay): proposed dispute protocol for
* Popcorn: zkEVMs criticize each other over attribution and marketing claims
Popcorn: zkEVMs criticize each other over attribution and marketing claims
* EIPs: EIP7441 : Upgrade block proposer election to Whisk
* EIP7441 : Upgrade block proposer election to Whisk
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7425 : Tokenized reserve ERC7432 : NFT roles ERC7439 :
Prevent ticket touting (ERC721 extension) ERC7444 : Time locks maturity
* Hardhat v2.17.1 : Solidity v0.8.21 support, console.log in pure functions & improved
Hardhat v2.17.1 : Solidity v0.8.21 support, console.log in pure functions & improved
* Foundry: Tip: generate local coverage reports using lcov
* Tip: generate local coverage reports using lcov
* Dan Finlay’s MATT auction (maximize NFT revenue) in Foundry, uses ERC20 allowance as
Dan Finlay’s MATT auction (maximize NFT revenue) in Foundry, uses ERC20 allowance as
* web3.py WebSocketProviderV2 : rewrite of WebsocketProvider, beta
web3.py WebSocketProviderV2 : rewrite of WebsocketProvider, beta
* CryptoZombies Optimism NFT course : create, test & deploy
CryptoZombies Optimism NFT course : create, test & deploy
* DeCipher : contract doc generator from block explorer URL
DeCipher : contract doc generator from block explorer URL
* Secureum RACE #20: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Secureum RACE #20: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
* Vyper malfunctioning reentrancy locks in v0.2.15/16 & v0.3.0, Curve $70M exploit
impacting Alchemix, JPEG'd & Metronome with some Alchemix & JPEG'd funds returned
Vyper malfunctioning reentrancy locks in v0.2.15/16 & v0.3.0, Curve $70M exploit
* LeetSwap (Solidly fork) on Base exploited , pool manipulated via internal function
LeetSwap (Solidly fork) on Base exploited , pool manipulated via internal function
* $20M sent to address poisoning spammer , USDT was later frozen
$20M sent to address poisoning spammer , USDT was later frozen
* Whitehacks kit : Foundry template to perform actions in single transaction using
Whitehacks kit : Foundry template to perform actions in single transaction using
* Solidity audit report generator (VSCode extension) using comments
Solidity audit report generator (VSCode extension) using comments
* Eight years since Ethereum mainnet launch
Eight years since Ethereum mainnet launch
* Ethereum.org translatathon : translate the website to win prizes
Ethereum.org translatathon : translate the website to win prizes
* OndoFinance USD Yield (USDY): tokenized note (US Treasuries & bank deposits), non-US
OndoFinance USD Yield (USDY): tokenized note (US Treasuries & bank deposits), non-US
* Karma delegate registry : onchain DAO delegate info [Disclosure: Starbloom portfolio]
Karma delegate registry : onchain DAO delegate info [Disclosure: Starbloom portfolio]
* Umbra Cash stealth address anonymity : heuristics could link most recipients &
Umbra Cash stealth address anonymity : heuristics could link most recipients &
* Tx chat : chat like interface to browse an addresses onchain messages
Tx chat : chat like interface to browse an addresses onchain messages
* Golem Octant Epoch Zero : $1M distributed amongst ten public goods projects
Golem Octant Epoch Zero : $1M distributed amongst ten public goods projects
* ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
* Wyoming Stable Token Commission seek Executive Director
Wyoming Stable Token Commission seek Executive Director
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth.
* GameStop removing iOS & browser extension wallets due to regulatory uncertainty
GameStop removing iOS & browser extension wallets due to regulatory uncertainty
* Revolut shutting down crypto services in US
Revolut shutting down crypto services in US
* Curve co-founder Michael Egorov deleveraging after Curve exploit
Curve co-founder Michael Egorov deleveraging after Curve exploit
* Ilya Lichtenstein admits to being Bitfinex 2016 hacker
Ilya Lichtenstein admits to being Bitfinex 2016 hacker
* US SEC charged Hex founder Richard Heart with unregistered offerings of securities
US SEC charged Hex founder Richard Heart with unregistered offerings of securities and
* FBI warns of NFT mint phishing scams
FBI warns of NFT mint phishing scams
* Rate-limiting nullifier (RLN) for spam prevention whilst preserving anonymity.
Rate-limiting nullifier (RLN) for spam prevention whilst preserving anonymity.
* ProtoGalaxy : efficient ProtoStar-style folding of multiple instances
ProtoGalaxy : efficient ProtoStar-style folding of multiple instances
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
* Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
* Oct 13-15 – Ethereum Kuala Lumpur conference & hackathon
Oct 13-15 – Ethereum Kuala Lumpur conference & hackathon
* Oct 31 – Road to Devcon grants application deadline
Oct 31 – Road to Devcon grants application deadline
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
